channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CA

item.title: Report X-2024010149
item.description:
Report X-2024010149

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-04
  • City: SYLMAR

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO HAZMAT SPILL IN THE UNLOAD. THE PACKAGE HAD SHIPPING PAPERS AND FLAMABLE LIQUID 3 LABEL ON IT. RESPONDER FOLLOWED DECISION TREE FOR CLEAN UP RESPONSE PROCEDURES.

item.title: Report E-2024010118
item.description:
Report E-2024010118

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-06
  • City: BLYTHE
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal UBY experienced a release from 24 boxes of UN1824 Mechanical Warewash Detergent each containing 1.5-gallon poly jugs. ERTS dispatched contractors to complete spill cleanup. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 2.5-gallons of product released in total to a 6’ x 12’ area of the trailer floor due to load shift/improper loading. Absorbents were deployed and worked into the impacted area. All impacted absorbents were placed into a 55-gallon poly drum. The damaged boxes of product were placed into (2) 55-gallon poly drums. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2024010304
item.description:
Report X-2024010304

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-16T18:13:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-23
  • City: STOCKTON
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in the unload. when package handler was unloaded, moving box from belt to rollers, the hazmat dropped braking open and spill on floor. DescribePack: package was leaking from the body or the top of the bag, DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was cleaned up with pads and the mess was placed into a tote lined with a hazardous material bag. And then taken to the HMPA for further. processing.

item.title: Report X-2024010352
item.description:
Report X-2024010352

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-27
  • City: SANTA FE SPRINGS
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package while being loaded was found to be damage due to a leak which QA was called to retrieve the package and place it in the hazmat area to be inspected and processed DescribePack: While package was being inspected the bottles inside didn't had any punctured or crack damage that was causing the leak but the caps were loose which was being loaded caused the leak inside DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: QA was called right away with absorbing pads to carefully clean the affected areas where the package was being loaded to and taken in a tote container to the hazmat area

item.title: Report X-2024010326
item.description:
Report X-2024010326

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-24
  • City: CITY OF INDUSTRY
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found with an internal leakage inside of the trailer in the unload. DescribePack: 1 of 2 canisters were found with a loose lid which caused the spillage, and for the other one to get soiled. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was immediately put into a hazmat bag along with the absorbent pads used to contain the spillage and taken to the hazmat cage.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The KAG West, LLC driver was delivering gasoline into the customer's storage tank. When the driver was relocating the hose, a cap came off the hose. This allowed approximately 1 gallon of gasoline to be released. Customer personnel responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
